feature-data.title: Data at your fingertips
feature-data.copy: Customer context in a single view. Purchases, billing, previous interactions - anything you need. Reduce time navigating administrative tools so you can focus on communicating with the customer.

feature-privacy-actions.title: Ensure privacy complaince
feature-privacy-actions.copy: Decide what data each support team member gets to see and which actions are available to them. Ensure GDPR privacy compliance with data auditing capability.

trial-text: 14 day free trial, no credit card required.

feature-magic-actions.title: Magic Actions
feature-magic-actions.copy: Automate repetitive workflows without code. Stop wasting time with manual data entry and Google Sheets. Perform tasks automatically instead.

feature-data-actions.title: Be Data Driven
feature-data-actions.copy: See every action taken. Easily add and read through notes from teammates for seamless interactions with customers.
